Reference

Environments

These are environments that contain variables used in sykdomspuls.

CONFIG

Variables produced by the daily algorithm

VARS

Global variables used for defining formats of data structures

PB

Environment for progress bars

Variables

These are global variables that are used in sykdomspuls. They should be moved inside the environment VARS

displayDays

The last date for each isoweek

norwayLocations

List of municipalities and counties

norwayMunicipMerging

List of municipality merging over time

Fake Data and Validation

These functions relate to fake data creation and data validation

GenFakeDataRaw()

Generate fake raw data

GenFakeDataClean()

Generate fake clean data

GenFakeDataAnalysis()

Generate fake data for analysis

GenFakeResultsFull()

Generate fake analysis results

ValidateDataClean()

Validate clean data

ValidateResultsFull()

Validate the analysis results

ValidateDataRaw()

Validate raw data

Data Functions

These functions relate to the detection, creation, validation, and saving of data files.

AddCounty()

Adds county to dataset

AddWkyrAndDisplayDateToWeekly()

Adds year-week and displayDate to dataset

AddXToWeekly()

Adds seasonal week to dataset

CleanData()

Format the raw data

CreateLatestDoneFile()

Create the latest done file

DeleteLatestDoneFile()

Delete the latest done file

DeleteOldDatasets()

Delete old datasets

DetermineStatus()

Convert n and thresholds to Normal/Medium/High

GenNorwayLocations()

Creates norwayLocations

GenNorwayMunicipMerging()

Creates the Norway Municip Merging (kommunesammenslaping) data.table

GenerateOutbreakListExternal()

Generates the external outbreak list

GenerateOutbreakListInternal()

Generates the internal outbreak list

GetCountyFromMunicip()

Finds county from municipality

GetLocationName()

Get location name from location code

GetPopulation()

Creates the population dataset

IdentifyAllDatasets()

Identify all raw/clean datasets that are available

IdentifyDatasets()

Identify the latest raw/clean datasets

LatestDatasets()

Latest datasets

LatestRawID()

test

ResultsAggregateApply()

ResultsAggregateApply

ResultsAggregateStack()

ResultsAggregateStack

SaveRDS()

Save data into multiple RDS files

UpdateData()

Top level function call for cleaning of data

Analysis Functions

These functions are related to the analysis portion of sykdomspuls.

StackAndEfficientDataForAnalysis()

Create analysis stack and datasets for a tag

CalculateTrainPredictYearPattern()

Determining which years of training data will be used

QuasipoissonTrainPredictData()

Quasipoisson Core Algorithm

RunOneAnalysis()

Run one analysis according to the analysis stack

FarringtonSEinGammaSpace()

Calculate Farrington SE in gamma space

FarringtonThreshold()

Calculate Farrington threshold

FarringtonZscore()

Farrington Z score

Email Functions

These functions are related to the emails that are produced by sykdomspuls.

GetAlertsEmails()

Get the correct alerts email excel sheet

EmailExternal()

Sends an external email warning about alters

EmailExternalGenerateTable()

Generates the outbreak table for the external email

EmailInternal()

Internal email for possible outbreaks

EmailNotificationOfFailedResults()

Email notification of failed results

EmailNotificationOfNewData()

Email notification of new data

EmailNotificationOfNewResults()

Email notification of new results

EmailTechnicalNewResults()

Internal email notifying about new results

EmailNorMOMOInfluensa()

Email notification of comparison between NorMOMO and Influensa

Shiny Functions

These functions are related to the shiny dashboard

RunShiny()

Run the shiny dashboard

SaveShinyAppDataToDB()

SaveShinyAppDataToDB

Helper Functions

These functions are helper functions

ConvertConfigForAPI()

Convert the new CONFIG for use in the old external API

StackIterator()

Stack Iterator

PBIncrement()

Increment the progress bar

PBInitialize()

Initialize the progress bar
